entry.title: Hello Internet
entry.content:
hello internet!

Hello Internet, I'm Martha. I'm a developer for Cheezburger Network (I Can Has Cheezburger, Failblog, Memebase, Know Your Meme). Well, at least I will be until June. I've been accepted into the summer batch of Hacker School and graciously given a grant from Etsy. Their goal is to make me "a significantly better programmer." My goal is to exceed their expectations :)

About me:

  • I am infatuated with JavaScript.
  • My first experience with programming was building a DOS based Star Wars game in 4th grade.
  • I was once a debutante (mostly against my will).
  • I want to show women/young women that being a programmer is glamorous and fun.
  • I graduated Summa Cum Laude from Auburn University.
  • Collaborate leadership is my game.

Never graduate ;) Martha
